meanings.definition: A play, movie, or broadcast program intended to make an audience laugh.
meanings.sent1: We watched a lot of comedies during the movie night.
meanings.sent2: She enjoys watching romantic comedies on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The comedies we saw last night were so funny that we couldn't stop laughing.
meanings.sent4: Life is like a series of comedies, full of unexpected twists and turns.
meanings.sent5: The comedies performed by the theater group were a hit with the audience.

meanings.definition: A humorous or amusing event or situation.
meanings.sent1: The family reunion turned into a series of comedies with all the funny stories shared.
meanings.sent2: His clumsy attempts at cooking always end up in comedies.
meanings.sent3: The comedies of errors that happened during the party made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The office meeting was a comedy of errors with all the mix-ups and confusion.
meanings.sent5: The school play turned into a comedy when the props fell apart on stage.
